blocks.subject: Re: 12 December Trade
text: W E E K E N D   S Y S T E M S   A V A I L A B I L I T Y
ARDMORE DATA CENTER - FACILITY OPERATIONS: No Scheduled Outages.
EB34 DATA CENTER - FACILITY OPERATIONS: No Scheduled Outages.
Time:  Sat 9/22/2001 at  6:00:00 PM CT thru Sun 9/23/2001 at  3:00:00 AM CT
Sat 9/22/2001 at  4:00:00 PM PT thru Sun 9/23/2001 at  1:00:00 AM PT
Sun 9/23/2001 at  12:00:00 AM London thru Sun 9/23/2001 at  9:00:00 AM London
Purpose: Improve reliability, performance, and increase information output.
Backout: 1. Switch IP DNS Entries for the Corp Domain for edinet.enron.com and ecnet.enron.com back to the original state
2. Restore database tables for edi_hub systems.
3. Switch IP DNS Entries for the Corp Domain for edinet.enron.com and ecnet.enron.com.
4. Save old code and script changes and install new code and configure new code from edi_qa.
ENRON CENTER SOUTH DATA CENTER - FACILITY OPERATIONS: No Scheduled Outages
Time:  Sat 9/22/2001 at  7:00:00 AM CT thru Sat 9/22/2001 at  9:00:00 AM CT
Sat 9/22/2001 at  5:00:00 AM PT thru Sat 9/22/2001 at  7:00:00 AM PT
Sat 9/22/2001 at  1:00:00 PM London thru Sat 9/22/2001 at  3:00:00 PM London
Outage:  Add network cards to (acta/oss/ossdw/fact) ebs cluster servers owl & osprey.
Purpose: The network cards that are being added were not available at the time of implementation.
Backout: Reboot the server without the hardware proposed to be added
Time:  Fri 9/21/2001 at  10:30:00 PM CT thru Sat 9/22/2001 at  12:15:00 AM CT
Fri 9/21/2001 at    8:30:00 PM PT thru  Fri 9/21/2001 at  10:15:00 PM PT
Sat 9/22/2001 at  4:30:00 AM London thru Sat 9/22/2001 at  6:15:00 AM London
Purpose: Standardization and address high peak Internet utilization
Time:  Fri 9/21/2001 at  9:00:00 PM CT thru Sat 9/22/2001 at   1:00:00 AM CT
Fri 9/21/2001 at  7:00:00 PM PT thru Fri 9/21/2001 at  11:00:00 PM PT
Sat 9/22/2001 at  3:00:00 AM London thru Sat 9/22/2001 at 7:00:00 AM London
Environments Impacted:  All users on any of the mailservers listed below
Backout: Make sure server comes up.
Time:  Fri 9/21/2001 at  9:00:00 PM CT thru Sat 9/22/2001 at   1:00:00 AM CT
Fri 9/21/2001 at  7:00:00 PM PT thru Fri 9/21/2001 at  11:00:00 PM PT
Sat 9/22/2001 at  3:00:00 AM London thru Sat 9/22/2001 at 7:00:00 AM London
Time:  Fri 9/21/2001 at  5:00:00 PM CT thru Fri 9/21/2001 at  6:00:00 PM CT
Fri 9/21/2001 at  3:00:00 PM PT thru Fri 9/21/2001 at  4:00:00 PM PT
Fri 9/21/2001 at  11:00:00 PM London thru Sat 9/22/2001 at  12:00:00 AM London
Purpose: Server is currently in an unreliable rack and will be moved
Time:  Fri 9/21/2001 at  11:00:00 PM CT thru Fri 9/21/2001 at  11:30:00 PM CT
Fri 9/21/2001 at    9:00:00 PM PT thru Fri 9/21/2001 at    9:30:00 PM PT
Sat 9/22/2001 at  5:00:00 AM London thru Sat 9/22/2001 at  5:30:00 AM London
Environments Impacted:  Corp. Sitara, CMS, Equity trading systems (R:\eqpm directory), Adaytum, CQG, TMS, PowerMap Europe, PowerDat Europe, MapInfo Professional, Secretariat

Purpose: Need to reboot servers to get NET IQ functioning for monitoring purposes. All applications residing on the R: drive will be temporarily unavailable from Friday, September 21, 2001 at 11:00 P.M. until 11:30 PM for users logging into the CORP domain serviced by Enron Net Works.  The outage is needed to perform required system maintenance updates and give us better monitoring ability to ensure consistent and  efficient operations.
Time:  Fri 9/21/2001 at  7:00:00 PM CT thru Fri 9/21/2001 at  9:00:00 PM CT
Fri 9/21/2001 at  5:00:00 PM PT thru Fri 9/21/2001 at  7:00:00 PM PT
Sat 9/22/2001 at  1:00:00 AM London thru Sat 9/22/2001 at  3:00:00 AM London
Outage:  Reboot HR DataWarehouse SAN Switches
Environments Impacted:  All. Hr applications namely eHRonline, GCS, HRGlobal, Expertfinder
Purpose: SAN switches need to be rebooted.
Time:  Sat 9/22/2001 at  7:00:00 AM CT thru Sat 9/22/2001 at  3:00:00 PM CT
Sat 9/22/2001 at  5:00:00 AM PT thru Sat 9/22/2001 at  1:00:00 PM PT
Sat 9/22/2001 at  1:00:00 PM London thru Sat 9/22/2001 at  9:00:00 PM London
Outage:  Migrate EBS Databases Cptrprod, Fibrprod, & Ipnprod
Purpose: Migrate EBS Databases into ENW infrastructure environment
Backout: Switch back to previous database servers
Time:  Sat 9/22/2001 at  5:00:00 PM CT thru Sat 9/22/2001 at  6:00:00 PM CT
Sat 9/22/2001 at  3:00:00 PM PT thru Sat 9/22/2001 at  4:00:00 PM PT
Sat 9/22/2001 at  11:00:00 PM London thru Sun 9/23/2001 at  12:00:00 AM London
Outage:  Move Ecttor-fs1 into the Corp Domain
Time:  Sat 9/22/2001 at  7:00:00 PM CT thru Sat 9/22/2001 at  8:00:00 PM CT
Sat 9/22/2001 at  5:00:00 PM PT thru Sat 9/22/2001 at  6:00:00 PM PT
Sun 9/23/2001 at  1:00:00 AM London thru Sun 9/23/2001 at  2:00:00 AM London
Outage:  Move Ecttor-ln1 into the Corp domain
Time:  Sun 9/23/2001 at  8:00:00 PM CT thru Sun 9/23/2001 at  10:00:00 PM CT
Sun 9/23/2001 at  6:00:00 PM PT thru Sun 9/23/2001 at    8:00:00 PM PT
Mon 9/24/2001 at  2:00:00 AM London thru Mon 9/24/2001 at  4:00:00 AM London
Purpose: Consolidation of all infrastructure products. To provide better stability for backup catalog.
Backout: Restart original rmancat database and recopy name.ora file then bounce the onames server.
Time:  Sun 9/23/2001 at  8:00:00 AM CT thru Sun 9/23/2001 at  10:00:00 AM CT
Sun 9/23/2001 at  6:00:00 AM PT thru Sun 9/23/2001 at    8:00:00 AM PT
Sun 9/23/2001 at  2:00:00 PM London thru Sun 9/23/2001 at  4:00:00 PM London
Outage:  Relocate the EBU catalog database
Purpose: Consolidation of infrastructure products.  To provide better stability for backups of 7.3.4 Oracle databases.
Backout: Re-open the database on neutron.
